title: [POLL] Should Riot stop making new champions for awhile?
body:
The selection of champions has been growing and growing and with each new champion the game changes a little bit. I'm curious how people feel about the number of champions in the game right now. Do you think we have enough or should riot keep pumping out more? 

I'm personally of the opinion that they should stop making new champions for the time being, let the game settle for a bit, focus on improving other things instead. 
What do you think?

replies.body:
They are focusing more heavily on reworking old champs for now and releasing champions much more slowly than in the past. Heck, when I started playing in season 2 it wasn't uncommon for there to be a new champ every 2 weeks. AoD made a song about it.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QOc0tD5Kdjs
I say a new champ every 5-8 months, or a reworked old champ if they need it.
Pretty sure they're already slowing down new champion releases.
Yeah, they announced this with Pyke's release. I'm not sure why the OP thought we needed to have a poll about something that's already being done.
